author: hship
msg: Fix NullPointerException when the Home page does NOT throw an exception inside validate().
Change the signature for AbstractApplication.cleanupAfterRequest to include the IRequestCycle.
Undo the [114878] fix, since it uses servlet 2.2 only API.

author: hship
msg: Speed up writing of catalog entries by using $(addprefix) to generate a single long line
(the old way invoked echo.exe a zillion times).

author: hship
msg: Attempt to speed up the build a little, by including the relative
pathname to source and resource files in the catalogs.
Hide a make invocation (related to generating the catalog) with a '@'.
